name: He Blocc!
description:
Welcome!

I am Darian, just a random guy who decided to make a game in one day. Well those are the results. So... let's begin with introduction!

You are this cute little guy:  ! It is a tiny color-changing, electricity powered robot, that can hover in the air by using his stored energy. That energy is represented by little bar in the top left corner and by a color of the robot when hovers. Green = Good!

To survive you need to get more energy! Pick up this: ! It is a battery that will give you +60 energy for your little buddy. Those are key to survival!

Your goal is to go as far as you can and get as many score as you can!

You control your robot by pressing:
- A - Move left
- D - Move right
- W - Hover
- J - Shoot

Why he shoots you ask? Well it's simple. The evil Eye Monsters  are coming fast in the robot's direction. You could dodge them... But you can also shoot 'em down!

The Combo is very important. It multiplies your score gain. You can gain combo by:
collecting orand destroying .

Be cereful! You miss one and your combo is going back to x1.

Reach combo 10x and more for an amazing effect!

You lose when the robot hits the bottom side of the screen or he is destroyed by  .

Good luck and share your score in the comments!
